comments: //all variables in this file containing (Comment) are comments on the variable below and do not need to be initiated
fileNameComment: /root/directory/valueMatrix.txt; OPTIONAL; Input file for which the rowAverages should be calculated
includeHeadersFnComment: /root/directory/columnHeaders.txt.; OPTIONAL; A file with the headersnames of the columns to include (enter separated)
stepListComment: //e.g. averages,center,removeNoVarianceRows; MANDATORY //comma separated list of all steps to take in this order
